text.textblock: Pursuant to section 10(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, 5 U.S.C., Appendix I), notice is hereby given for Special Committee 162 meeting to be held March 29-31, starting at 9:30 a.m. The meeting will be held at the Stanford Telecom (STEL): Steve VanTrees, Phone: (703) 438-8014.

The agenda for this meeting is as follows: (1) Chairman's introductory remarks; (2) Approval of the summary of the twentieth meeting held May 12-13, 1993. RTCA Paper No. 276-93/SC162-166 (previously distributed); (3) Reports of Related Activities being conducted by other organizations; (5) Review and plan the activity of Working Group 1, ``ATN MASPS & Router MOPS.''; (6) Plan the activity of Working Group 2, ``Rewrite DO-205, Part 1.''; (7) Review industry systems management activity; (8) Other business; (9) Date and place of next meeting. (7) Date and place of next meeting.

Attendance is open to the interested public but limited to space available. With the approval of the Chairman, members of the public may present oral statements at the meeting. Persons wishing to present statements or obtain information should contact the RTCA Secretariat, 1140 Connecticut Avenue, NW., suite 1020, Washington, DC 20036; (202) 833-9339. Any member of the public may present a written statement to the committee at any time.
Issued in Washington, DC, on February 15, 1994.

The first day, March 29, the SC-162 plenary will meet. The following two days, March 30-31, will be a working session to begin drafting the Avionics Router MOPS. The meeting will be held at STEL for all three days.

doctitle.textblock: RTCA, Inc., Special Committee 162, Aviation Systems Design Guidelines for Open Systems Interconnection; Meeting
